T05TD4008E:198b-1: skandha tri s'a dha na n'a ma /
T05TD4008E:198b-3: phung po gsum pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T05TD4008E:198b-5: 'gro ba'i mi shes gdung sel ba ;
T05TD4008E:198b-6: / thub pa nyi zla la btud nas //
T05TD4008E:198b-7: sdig pa thams cad rab 'khru ba'i //
T05TD4008E:198b-8: cho ga yang dag bstan par bya //
T05TD4008E:198b-9: dus yul kun slong byed pa dang //
T05TD4008E:198b-10: ngo bo rnam smin bsam byas pas //
T05TD4008E:198b-11: dug 'thungs lta bur yid byung des //
T05TD4008E:198b-13: zla stod skar ma bzang ba'i tshe //
T05TD4008E:199a-2: phyogs bzhir tho bzhi btsugs pa la //
T05TD4008E:199a-3: sngags chu yongs su blugs par bya //
T05TD4008E:199a-4: de yi sngags ni 'di yin te //
T05TD4008E:199a-5: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T05TD4008E:199a-6: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T05TD4008E:199a-9: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T05TD4008E:199a-13: tsi li mi li bandha mi /
T05TD4008E:199a-15: zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T05TD4008E:199a-16: de nas khrus byas stan la 'dug / byams pa la sogs bsgom bya ste //
T05TD4008E:199a-17: dang por yi dags gtor ma btang //
T05TD4008E:199a-18: de nas chos skyong srung ma la //
T05TD4008E:199a-19: gtor ma la btang nas gsol ba gdab //
T05TD4008E:199a-20: sangs rgyas bstan srung zhal bzhes pa //
T05TD4008E:199a-21: rgyal chen bzhi sogs ma lus rnams //
T05TD4008E:199a-22: bdag la dgongs gsol bdag cag rnams //
T05TD4008E:199a-23: byang chub ltung ba bshags pa yi //
T05TD4008E:199a-24: lam zhugs nas ni sdig 'chags la //
T05TD4008E:199a-25: bar chad rkyen ni mi 'byung zhing //
T05TD4008E:199a-26: bgegs kyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar //
T05TD4008E:199a-27: sdig pa bshags pa'i cho ga 'di //
T05TD4008E:199a-28: myur du 'grub par mdzad du gsol //
T05TD4008E:199a-29: de nas phyag 'tshal sogs bdun bya //
T05TD4008E:199a-30: yang ni gsol ba gdab bya ba //
T05TD4008E:199a-31: phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi //
T05TD4008E:199a-32: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T05TD4008E:199a-33: bdag la dgongs gsol snga ma bzhin //
T05TD4008E:199a-34: de nas byang shar phyogs gnas pa //
T05TD4008E:199a-35: rgyal ba sum cu rtsa lnga rnams //
T05TD4008E:199a-36: rgyal sras lhag pa'i lha kun dang //
T05TD4008E:199a-37: rang bzhin dbyer med bsam byas te //
T05TD4008E:199a-38: phyag re btsal bas lce thog na //
T05TD4008E:199a-39: yod sdig bsal bar bsam bya'o //
T05TD4008E:199a-40: lhag ma 'dug la gus pas gdon //
T05TD4008E:199a-41: de bzhin du ni tshar lnga nyid //
T05TD4008E:199a-42: de nas gcig ni dang po bzhin //
T05TD4008E:199a-43: bton nas de ni mi dmigs bsam //
T05TD4008E:199a-44: ngal na lha yi bzlas pa bya //
T05TD4008E:199a-45: ngal sos nas kyang de bzhin te //
T05TD4008E:199a-46: nyin mtshan lan drug 'bad bya ba //
T05TD4008E:199a-47: zhag ni gsum la sogs par bya //
T05TD4008E:199a-48: zin nas tho rangs khrus byas te //
T05TD4008E:199a-49: mchod dang gsol ba gdab par bya //
T05TD4008E:199a-50: phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa yi //
T05TD4008E:199a-51: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i rnams //
T05TD4008E:199a-52: bdag la dgongs gsol bdag sdig rnams //
T05TD4008E:199a-53: dag pa'i mchan ma bstan du gsol //
T05TD4008E:199a-54: lan gsum brjod de tshul bzhin nyal //
T05TD4008E:199a-55: de nas rmi lam brtag bya ba //
T05TD4008E:199a-56: chu bo chen po rgal ba dang //
T05TD4008E:199a-57: zam pa la 'gro khrus byed dang //
T05TD4008E:199a-58: gos med pa la char 'bab dang //
T05TD4008E:199a-59: rgyal ba sum cu rtsa lnga rnams //
T05TD4008E:199a-60: mthong ba la sogs rtags zhes zer //
T05TD4008E:199b-0: skul byed gzungs las @199b 'di ltar bshad //
T05TD4008E:199b-2: nyi zla mthong dang me 'bar dang //
T05TD4008E:199b-3: ma he mi nag thub pa dang //
T05TD4008E:199b-5: glang po khyu mchog ri bo dang //
T05TD4008E:199b-6: seng ge khang bzangs steng 'dzegs dang //
T05TD4008E:199b-7: tshes nyan rmi na sdig bral rtags //
T05TD4008E:199b-8: de dag mtshan 'dzin brjod pa dang //
T05TD4008E:199b-9: chos 'di bklags pa nyid kyis kyang //
T05TD4008E:199b-12: nyan thos theg pas de ltar min //
T05TD4008E:199b-13: de dges 'gro ba ma lus pa //
T05TD4008E:199b-14: nges shes sdig pa rab spangs te //
T05TD4008E:199b-15: sgrib gnyis dag pa'i ye shes ni //
T05TD4008E:199b-16: thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed shog / phung po gsum pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon krishna pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T05TD4008E:199b-18: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'an dang /
T05TD4008E:199b-19: lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
